original_text: everything that can stand the fire, you shall pass through the fire, and it shall be clean. Nevertheless, it shall also be purified with the water for impurity. And whatever cannot stand the fire, you shall pass through the water.
korean_text: 불에 견딜 만한 모든 물건은 불을 지나게 하라 그리하면 깨끗하려니와 다만 정결하게 하는 물로 그것을 깨끗하게 할 것이며 불에 견디지 못할 모든 것은 물을 지나게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: everything that can stand the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 불을 견딜 수 있는 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: you shall pass through the fire
it shall also be purified with the water for impurity
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 부정을 씻는 물로 정결하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And whatever cannot stand the fire
you shall pass through the water
